import React from 'react' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import LogInForm from './LogInForm' import CreateAccountForm from './CreateAccountForm' import RestoreAccountForm from './ResotreAccountForm' import Container from 'react-bootstrap/Container' import Row from 'react-bootstrap/Row' import Col from 'react-bootstrap/Col' class LogInPage extends React.Component<{}, {logIn: boolean, createAccount: boolean, restorePassword: boolean}>{ constructor(props: any){ super(props) this.state ={ logIn: false, createAccount: false, restorePassword: true } this.changeFormLogin = this.changeFormLogin.bind(this) this.changeFormCreate = this.changeFormCreate.bind(this) this.changeFormRestore = this.changeFormRestore.bind(this) } changeFormCreate(){ this.setState({ logIn: false, createAccount: true, restorePassword: false }) } changeFormRestore(){ this.setState({ logIn: false, createAccount: false, restorePassword: true }) } changeFormLogin(){ this.setState({ logIn: true, createAccount: false, restorePassword: false }) } render(){ return(
